Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by any approval activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Minimun time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time it takes 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Minimun time until 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' is followed by 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' before a new submission
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases leading to 'Request Payment'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' after 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in variants leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case where activity 'Payment Handled occurs

Name: Minimun resolution time of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' in the process leading to final approval
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases where it occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' in successful claim processes
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
